sentences.cn: 安妮: 桑迪够有远见的.

sentences.en: Another 3.6 percent were farsighted, meaning they can see at a distance but not up close.
sentences.cn: 另3.6%患有远视 —— 能看清远距离,但不能看清太近的物体.

sentences.en: Are you nearsighted or farsighted ? Only my right eye is nearsighted.
At least, people who were not as farsighted as I will call it that.
sentences.cn: 至少, 那些和我一样有远见的人会这样说.

sentences.en: Bilingualism is a farsighted educational policy.
sentences.cn: 双语体制是很有远见的体制.

sentences.en: Facing new century, Bonny's person heroic feelings so farsighted. "
sentences.cn: 面对新世纪,邦力人豪情万丈, 志在千里 .

sentences.en: Haven't farsighted economists been telling us that in the future we will work less, not more?
sentences.cn: 有远见的经济学家们不是一直在告诉我们，将来我们会工作得更少而不是更多吗？

sentences.en: How farsighted the deal turns out to be remains in question.
sentences.cn: 因此,这笔交易究竟有多有远见还是个问题.

sentences.en: It is universally achnowledged that Ex - premier was a farsighted stateman.
sentences.cn: 前任首相是一位公认的有远见的政治家.

sentences.en: Many country tour developments exist bigger blindness, considers at present, regardless of farsighted.

不, 我只是有远见罢了.

sentences.en: Only the farsighted will see that the economic case for such an operation is compelling.
sentences.cn: 只有有远见者将看到这样经济情况是必须采取行动的.

sentences.en: People who are farsighted suffer from just the opposite problem.
sentences.cn: 远视者的苦恼则起因于正好相反的问题.

sentences.en: The farsighted eye can usually see objects in the distance clearly but near objects appear blurry.
sentences.cn: 在有远见的眼睛通常可以看到远处的对象明确,但附近的物体变得模糊.

sentences.en: The new prime minister is generally acknowledged as a farsighted statesman.
sentences.cn: 新首相是一位公认的有“远见”的政治家.

sentences.en: The new prime minister is generally acknowledged as farsighted statesman.
sentences.cn: 新首相是一位公认的有远见的政治家.

words.tran_cn: 有远见的；能看到远处的

trans.tran_cn: 有远见的，目光如炬，有先见之明
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as farsighted, you admire them because they understand what is likely to happen in the future, and therefore make wise decisions and plans
